entry.title: Koala Red Band Assorted Sours Candies 1 kg - 1 Bag
entry.summary:
Vendor: Koala
Type: Bulk
Price: 9.99

Sour Candy Imported from Holland

The Koala Red Band Assorted Chews are awesomely chewy, intensely flavourful and oh so sour! Give your customers a true taste of sour and delicious flavour with this old fashioned candy!

Koala Red Band Assorted Sours will keep those sour candy lovers coming back to your store time and time again!

1 kg

INGREDIENTS: 

SUGAR, GLUCOSE SYRUP (WHEAT), MODIFIED STARCH (CORN AND POTATO), MALIC ACID, LACTIC ACID, GELATINE, HYDROGENATED PALM FAT, FLAVOURS, CONCENTRATE FROM (BLACK CARROT, SPIRULINA, SAFFLOWER, CARROT, BLACKCURRANT), COLOURS.

INGRÉDIENTS: 

SUCRE, SIROP DE GLUCOSE (DE BLÉ), AMIDON MODIFIÉ (DE MAÏS ET POMME DE TERRE), ACIDE MALIQUE, ACIDE LACTIQUE, GÉLATINE, HUILE DE PALME HYDROGÉNÉE, ARÔMES, CONCENTRÉ DE (CARROTE NOIRE, SPIRULINA, CARTHAME DES TEINTURIERS, CAROTTE, CASSIS), COLORANTS .

entry.title: Koala Jumbo Sour Suckers 60 Pieces - 1 Tub
entry.summary:
Vendor: Red Band
Type: Bulk
Price: 9.50

Sour Soothers Gummy Candy

Jumbo Sour Suckers by Red Band

You'll be a sucker for these Sour Suckers! Also known as Sour Soothers, or Sour Keys, but whatever you call them they are always an amazing sour candy! Jumbo Sour Suckers are ultra chewy and fruity tasting and come covered with a flavoursome mix of sugary and sour tasting granules on the outside. A perfect balance of sweet and sour and a delicious bite of youth! Make your customers feel like candy-loving kids again with Jumbo Sour Suckers!

60 Pieces - 1 Tub

 Fresh Sour Candy Shipped Fast at Wholesale Prices!
